name: image_school_name
label: Take Photo of main school sign

name: verified
label: Verify the School Name and School EMIS

name: number_pupils_staff
label: 1.7) Number of Pupils that attend the school

name: number_pupils_staff_estimate
label: 1.8) If number not  known estimate number of pupils that attend the school:

name: weather_condition
label: 1.13) Weather Condition on day of survey

name: distance_river
label: 2.3) Distance of site away from river /body of water ?

name: risk_of_flooding
label: 2.4) Is the site at risk of flooding?

name: last_flood_event
label: 2.4.1) If yes, is there a history of flooding when was Last flood event (year - BS)

name: flood_height
label: 2.4.2) If there is a flooding risk what is Maximum historical flood height (metres)

name: flood_mitigation_measures
label: 2.4.3) If there is a flooding risk are there any flood mitigation measures?

name: man_made_drainage
label: 2.5) Are there any man-made drainage systems / culverts on or near the site?

name: drainage_system_culverts_overflowed
label: 2.5.1) If yes, have the drainage systems / culverts ever overflowed / been prone to blockage?

name: landslide_history
label: 2.6.1) If history of landslides when was last landslide event ? (year BS)

name: general_terrain
label: 2.7) What is the general terrain of surrounding area?

name: general_topography
label: 2.8) What is the general topography of the School campus?

name: approx_distance_to_road
label: 2.9) Approximate Distance to main road from entrance to school /campus.

name: linear_feature
label: 2.11) Are there any linear features or vertical offsets on the site, which could indicate an active fault / landslide risk ?

name: number_of_buildings
label: 3.1) Number of School Buildings (Blocks) on school campus

name: number_of_tlc
label: 3.2) Number of Temporary Learning Centres on school campus.

name: funded
label: 3.2.1) Who Funded and built the Temporary Learning Centres ?

name: safe_location
label: 3.4) Is there a safe location outside the buildings where ALL staff and students can currently assemble in an emergency event?

name: location_for_tlc
label: 3.5) Excluding safe assembly location is there any additional space  for Temporary Learning  Centers on the school campus?

name: wash_facilities
label: 3.8) Are their WASH facilities available ? If so what condition are they in?

name: water_tanks
label: 3.9) Is there safe drinking water available on site ?

name: electricity_supply
label: 3.10) Is the school connected to a electricity supply ?

name: backup_generator
label: 3.11) Does the school have back up power?

name: exit_point
label: 3.12) How many exit points are there for people to evacuate the site on foot ?

name: proximity_to_unsafe
label: 3.14) Is there proximity to unsafe structures, such as, perimeter walls, water towers, trees, generator and potentially damaging debris?
